html.p: A spherical capacitor is formed from a solid metallic sphere of radius [mathjaxinline]R_1[/mathjaxinline] surrounded by a thin spherical conducting shell of inner radius [mathjaxinline]R_2[/mathjaxinline]. Find the capacitance of this arrangement. Also, find the total energy if charges [mathjaxinline]\pm Q[/mathjaxinline] are put on the inner and outer surfaces, respectively.
